name: Spooky Joint Provider Hedged
description: Supplies {{token}} as half of a joint liquidity provider for a pool on [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/farms) also this strategy limits Impermanent Loss via Hedgil in a protection range while earning BOO and fees. Earned tokens are harvested, divided between the pairs, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.
